title: relational.write
description: Write into a SQL-compatible data store

connection.title: The connection to use for loading
connection.description: Logical connection name as defined in the connections.yaml

schema.title: The table schema of the target table
schema.description: If left blank, the default schema of this connection will be used as defined in the connections.yaml

keys.title: Business keys to use in case of `load_strategy` is UPSERT or working with `opcode_field`

opcode_field.description: Name of the field in the payload that holds the operation (c - create, d - delete, u - update) for this record in the DB

active_record_indicator.description: Used for `TYPE2` load_strategy. An SQL expression used to identify which rows are active

inactive_record_mapping.title: Used for `TYPE2` load_strategy. The columns mapping to use to close out an active record
inactive_record_mapping.description: A list of columns to use. Use any valid SQL expression for the source. If 'target' is omitted, will default to the name of the source column
